subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Chargers linebacker Stephen Cooper was suspended by the N.F.L. for four games for testing positive for a banned stimulant. He will miss San Diego’s first four games of the 2008 season.
snippet: Chargers linebacker Stephen Cooper was suspended by the N.F.L. for four games for testing positive for a banned stimulant. He will miss San Diego’s first four games of the 2008 season.
